results.content: Curso ha sido muy bueno empezando por lo básico hasta tópicos más avanzados. Al ser un curso no específico de ML o Streaming, estos apartados han sido bastante cortos. El instructor muy bueno y la explicación también. Lo recomiendo
results.content_html: Curso ha sido muy bueno empezando por lo básico hasta tópicos más avanzados. Al ser un curso no específico de ML o Streaming, estos apartados han sido bastante cortos. El instructor muy bueno y la explicación también. Lo recomiendo

results.content: Me encantó éste curso,  me agradó mucho que el instructor saliera en los videos  y nos explicara  o comentara ciertas cosas,  de igual manera me agradó que en los videos de teoría saliera su voz  y las presentaciones del tema,  y cuando tocaban ejercicios me gustó mucho que pusiera su pantalla  y nos explicara el código mostrando éste mismo,  y ejecutara su respectivo programa.  Me gusta mucho como explica,  se le entiende muy bien.  Muy buen instructor.
results.content_html: Me encantó éste curso, me agradó mucho que el instructor saliera en los videos y nos explicara o comentara ciertas cosas, de igual manera me agradó que en los videos de teoría saliera su voz y las presentaciones del tema, y cuando tocaban ejercicios me gustó mucho que pusiera su pantalla y nos explicara el código mostrando éste mismo, y ejecutara su respectivo programa. Me gusta mucho como explica, se le entiende muy bien. Muy buen instructor.

results.content: I think it was a really good course but I expected more exercises to do. Nevertheless everything was well explained!
results.content_html: I think it was a really good course but I expected more exercises to do. Nevertheless everything was well explained!

results.content: It was a little bit fast, but I could learn lots of things I didn´t know about spark over python. Good course for having basic to intermediate knowledge of spark
results.content_html: It was a little bit fast, but I could learn lots of things I didn´t know about spark over python. Good course for having basic to intermediate knowledge of spark

results.content: Some of the lectures are not helpful even after proceeding same steps getting some errors.
results.content_html: Some of the lectures are not helpful even after proceeding same steps getting some errors.

results.content: Very good explanations, covers the gap for me between Python and Spark. I know SQL to an advanced level, so it has been good to leverage that knowledge and apply it to the Spark world that Frank has explained so well. Great course.
results.content_html: Very good explanations, covers the gap for me between Python and Spark. I know SQL to an advanced level, so it has been good to leverage that knowledge and apply it to the Spark world that Frank has explained so well. Great course.

results.content: Would prefer more of an overview of Spark concepts before diving into code. What is a Job/Task/Stage? How do partitions work? What do the different Managers do, and do I need to think about them?
results.content_html: Would prefer more of an overview of Spark concepts before diving into code. What is a Job/Task/Stage? How do partitions work? What do the different Managers do, and do I need to think about them?

results.content: The course is clearly structured and instructor explains things carefully. I did find the exercises a bit too superficial and after finishing the course I don't feel I can immediately implement solutions in spark.
results.content_html: The course is clearly structured and instructor explains things carefully. I did find the exercises a bit too superficial and after finishing the course I don't feel I can immediately implement solutions in spark.

results.content: Really enjoyed the course. looking forward to put what I have learned through this course in to real world problems.
results.content_html: Really enjoyed the course. looking forward to put what I have learned through this course in to real world problems.

results.content: The installation needs more update for new comer. The naming convention is highly inconsistence with python PEP-8 and some exercise are outdate on Spark 2.
results.content_html: The installation needs more update for new comer. The naming convention is highly inconsistence with python PEP-8 and some exercise are outdate on Spark 2.

results.content: Great Course! Thoroughly enjoyed Frank Kane's insights and commentary on the concepts and topics covered. I had some experience with R's sparklyr interface to Apache Spark coming in..but his sessions helped cement my understanding further as well as introduce new ways to use Apache Spark. His example of using an RDD as a NoSQL database blew my mind away! Will definitely check out the scala version of this class.
results.content_html: Great Course! Thoroughly enjoyed Frank Kane's insights and commentary on the concepts and topics covered. I had some experience with R's sparklyr interface to Apache Spark coming in..but his sessions helped cement my understanding further as well as introduce new ways to use Apache Spark. His example of using an RDD as a NoSQL database blew my mind away! Will definitely check out the scala version of this class.

results.content: Really Good Stuff and hands on excersizes. Videos more than 10 min cause problem for few candidates.. try to make short portion if possible.. thanks
results.content_html: Really Good Stuff and hands on excersizes. Videos more than 10 min cause problem for few candidates.. try to make short portion if possible.. thanks
